# Screenshots Directory

This directory contains screenshots and demo images for the project.

## Guidelines

- Use PNG or JPG format
- Keep file sizes reasonable (< 1MB per image)
- Use descriptive filenames
- Include both light and dark theme screenshots if applicable

## Recommended Screenshots

1. `monitor-window.png` - Main monitoring window
2. `settings-window.png` - Settings interface
3. `demo.gif` - Animated demo (optional)
4. `desktop-view.png` - App in context on desktop
